lead_paragraph: Denis Watson won the AT&T Champions Classic for his third Champions Tour title in two seasons, beating Loren Roberts with a birdie on the third hole of a playoff at Valencia, Calif.Watson, the 2007 Senior PGA Championship and Boeing Classic winner, birdied the par-5 18th in regulation for a seven-under-par 65 and a share of the top spot with Roberts (70) and Brad Bryant (72).
